titles.title: Retirement Investment in Small Employers Act
Retirement Investment in Small Employers Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a microemployer pension plan startup credit.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Retirement Investment in Small Employers Act
This bill allows an increased tax credit for small employer pension plan startup costs for certain qualified microemployers (eligible employers who accept certain matching contributions).
